Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH

Posts.Content: Mar 23, 2017 11:23PM hilltop49 wrote: I was on Afinitor/Femara (clinical trial) for 2 years but it has stopped working. I just started this week on Ibrance/Faslodex. After 2 days I've had no side effects, but I realize it's early and cumulative effects may come later. Ibrance is oral - 3 weeks on and 1 week off, and Faslodex is 2 injections in rear every 28 days. I also get Xgeva shots for my bone mets. There is a great Ibrance forum here. Check it out.
Posts.Title: After afinitor and aromasin fail... yangtan EvaGor
